mapper.select: select a.id, a.regDate, a.value, e.title from user_point_history a join payment_main b on a.paymentId = b.id join reserve_main c on b.reserveId = c.id join performance_main d on c.performanceId = d.id join performance_info e on d.infoId = e.id where a.userId = #{userId}

SELECT A.id as id, A.password, A.nickname, A.birthday, A.gender, A.email, A.tel, A.admin, B.regDate, B.deleted, B.point, B.getLike, B.getNotify, B.iconId, B.grade, B.totalPoint, B.shutout, C.postalCode, C.sido, C.sigungu, C.addr FROM user_main A JOIN user_sub B ON A.id = B.id left outer JOIN user_address C ON A.id = C.id WHERE B.deleted = 'N' AND A.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.nickname, b.regDate, (select count(likedUser) from user_like_user where likedUser=a.id) getlike from user_main a, user_sub b WHERE a.id = b.id
and MONTH(a.birthday) = MONTH(current_timestamp) and b.deleted = 'N'
and b.deleted = 'Y'
and MONTH(b.regDate) = MONTH(current_timestamp) and b.deleted = 'N'
and ... and b.deleted = 'N'
and b.deleted = 'N'
ORDER BY b.regDate DESC
ORDER BY getlike DESC
LIMIT #{beginIndex},#{endIndex}

SELECT count(*) from user_main a, user_sub b WHERE a.id = b.id
and MONTH(a.birthday) = MONTH(current_timestamp) and b.deleted = 'N'
and b.deleted = 'Y'
and ... and b.deleted = 'N'
and MONTH(b.regDate) = MONTH(current_timestamp) and b.deleted = 'N'
and b.deleted = 'N'

SELECT a.id, a.nickname, b.regDate, a.password, a.gender,a.birthday,a.tel, a.email,b.point,c.postalCode, c.sido,c.sigungu,c.addr, (select count(likedUser) from user_like_user where likedUser=a.id) getlike from user_main a, user_sub b, user_address c WHERE a.id = b.id AND a.id = c.id and a.id = #{value} ORDER BY b.regDate DESC
select id,interestTag,interestCategory from user_interest where id = #{userId}
select introTag from user_intro where id = #{userId}

SELECT A.id as id, A.password, A.nickname, A.birthday, A.gender, A.email, A.tel, A.admin, B.regDate, B.deleted, B.point, B.getLike, B.getNotify, B.iconId, B.grade, B.totalPoint, B.shutout, C.postalCode, C.sido, C.sigungu, C.addr FROM user_main A JOIN user_sub B ON A.id = B.id left outer JOIN user_address C ON A.id = C.id WHERE A.email = #{email}
select b.id as id, name, type, value, getDate, used, expDate from user_coupon a join coupon b on b.id = a.couponId where a.id = #{id}
select b.id as id, opened, name, comment, iconPath from user_badge a join badge b on a.`badgeId` = b.`id` where a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user_main (id, password, nickname, birthday, gender, email, tel) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel})
insert into user_address (id, postalCode, sido, sigungu, addr) values (#{id},#{postalCode}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{addr})
mapper.update: update user_main set nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, tel = #{tel} where id = #{id}
update user_address set postalCode = #{postalCode}, sido = #{sido}, sigungu = #{sigungu}, addr = #{addr} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT into user_point_history (userId, paymentId, status, value) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{payment.id}, #{status}, #{value})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.regDate, a.value, e.title from user_point_history a join payment_main b on a.paymentId = b.id join reserve_main c on b.reserveId = c.id join performance_main d on c.performanceId = d.id join performance_info e on d.infoId = e.id where a.userId = #{userId} order by id desc limit #{rowPerPage} offset #{startRow}

select b.id as id, name, type, value, getDate, used, expDate from user_coupon a join coupon b on b.id = a.couponId where a.id = #{userId} and used = "N" order by getDate desc limit #{rowPerPage} offset #{startRow}
